title: Album Page, "Sketch of Landscape with Trees and Sky", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on white wove paper, lined
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Very rough sketch of one small (lower center) and two large trees (right middle ground) with birds flying in sky.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Sketch of Landscape with Trees and Sky", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Graphite on white wove paper, lined. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-85-16.
